name: Monster Tag
description:
4 player (Monster)Tag game!!

Controls:

From keyboard(s):

  • Player1: WASD + SPACE
  • Player2: IJKL + N
  • Player3: ARROWS + RCTRL
  • Player4: num8456 + num0

From Xbox360 controller(s):

  • Left stick + A

Gameplay rules:

  • -100 points if you get caught
  • no points in monster form
  • boost the monster to dash forward
  • no points for 1 sec if you boost
  • pick up coin for +50 points
  • the first player to reach 1500 points wins!
